entry.title: Sunday night: A few flurries. Low minus 21.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness before morning then a few flurries. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Wind becoming southeast 20 gusting to 40 overnight. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 27 this evening and minus 32 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: A few flurries ending in the morning then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 26 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning late in the evening. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind south 20 km/h becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 overnight. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 8 in the evening and minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Sunday 19 February 2023
